tool_description: Send gift cards through a single, simple REST API. Access thousands of local and national merchants (USA) through our Gifting Platform. From customer love to internal employee rewards, developers are using the API to create solutions that could only be accomplished before by physically buying and shipping plastic gift cards. Gifts can be tied to a specific location, perfect for converting online engagement to in-store traffic via measurable marketing campaigns. We are always looking for new use cases and case studies to feature so if you have any questions, comments, or general feedback drop us a line at developers@yiftee.com! *This API points to our sandbox server and no real gifts will be issues*

api_list.name: Balance
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://deepakrt123-yiftee-sandbox-mentiontribe.p.rapidapi.com/account/balance"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "deepakrt123-yiftee-sandbox-mentiontribe.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
